name: ai-pulse-daily-monorepo
description: AI Pulse Daily - Enterprise-grade news aggregation platform

scripts.kill-port: node -e "const port = process.argv[1] || 4000; const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { const cmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? `for /f \"tokens=5\" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :${port}') do @taskkill /F /PID %a` : `lsof -ti:${port} | xargs kill -9`; execSync(cmd, {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}); console.log('端口', port, '已清理'); } catch(e) { console.log('端口', port, '未被占用或清理失败'); }"
